title: Influencer Pet Cloning: Sci fi Weirdness or Ensuring your bags?
itunes:title: Influencer Pet Cloning: Sci fi Weirdness or Ensuring your bags?
description:
This week we're taking an interesting spin on pet influencers and the rise of pet cloning. Are these folks trying to secure the bag or utilize these new advancements in technology to help them with their grief? What's the process (spoiler alert: it costs an arm and a leg)? What are the ethics? And would you do it if you were in their shoes? Come join us this week as we try and figure it out if this is sci fi weirdness (have we gone too far?) or an interesting development in what the future may hold for pet owners/fur moms and dads.


Basic Bitch Quickies this week:

  • Kayne spreading rumors that Pete has AIDs
  • Chris Brown getting sued: Jane Doe claims he drugged and raped her during a Miami yacht party


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
